list.name: Changes
list.comment: Convert post excerpts to HTML using Markdown for better content rendering.

MESSAGE.value: Remove default CSS generation and update templates to exclude stylesheet references
Update navigation structure to include `nav-right` container and dynamically display `siteName`
Add pagination support with CLI option and enhance index rendering logic
Remove all site content, templates, and workspace configurations
Update workspace configuration comments to reflect recent changes to site content and templates
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `/site` and adjust workspace configuration comments
Extract default content and templates into a separate module and refactor CLI initialization logic to use it.
Update workspace configuration comments to align with recent refactoring changes
Refactor pagination logic and enforce consistent code formatting across renderer and defaults modules
Replace Python-based dev server with integrated HTTP server using `vibe.d` and improve CLI error handling. Update dependencies and documentation accordingly. Mark completed features in `README.md`.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main'
# Conflicts: # .idea/workspace.xml
Update workspace configuration comments for better alignment with recent changes
Update CLI to use dynamic versioning and improve HTTP server settings; bump dependencies
Integrate default Zen-inspired styles and redesign templates for improved aesthetics and structure
Enhance static file handling by adding default `robots.txt`, supporting theme and project-level static files, and improving CLI initialization logging.
Update workspace configuration comments to reflect recent changes.
Remove references to Hugo Zen theme for cleaner and more neutral templates
Remove debug logs and unnecessary newlines for cleaner and streamlined code.
Refactoring
Introduce foundational modules for a new static site generator in D
Implement pagination support with associated tests and HTML generation
Update workspace configuration to reflect recent changes in pagination implementation
Redesign templates and integrate default styling files. Introduce template-based pagination rendering for improved modularity. Update workspace configuration accordingly.
Integrate centralized template management and enhance pagination with reusable HTML.
Convert post excerpts to HTML using Markdown for better content rendering.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Convert post excerpts to HTML using Markdown for better content rendering.
